location.address: Unit 37D, Clarks Village Street , Somerset BA16 0BB
location.getting_there: Exit M5, Junction 23 and follow the A39 to Street/Clarks Village. From the A303, exit the Podimore roundabout and follow the B3151 to Street/Clarks Village. The nearest train are Castle Cary, Taunton and Yeovil, all approx. 30 minutes away by car.
